verses.content: Chuongchun, Mosie chun biekbûk chu ân ngir zo a, hriek a nâl a, a sukthieng a, a thuomhnaw po po le a mâichâm le a bûrlebêlhai po po hriek a nâl a, a sukthieng ni chun,
Israel ṭhuoituhai, an pahnam ṭhuoituhai chun thilinhlân an inhlân a, chuonghai chu an hnam ṭhuoi- tuhai, an tiemhai chunga kha um an nih.

An thilinhlânhai chu tawlailîr chung nei paruk le, bâwngchal sâwm- pahni, ṭhuoitu pahniin tawlailîr pakhat pei, pakhatin bâwngchal pakhat pei LALPA hmaa chun an hung lâk a, biekbûk bula chun an hung inhlân a.
LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Biekbûk sina dingin a ṭangkai ding a na, lo la raw khai, Levi mihai an sin thaw izir ang peiin pe seng i ta,” tiin.
Chuongchun, Mosie chun tawlai- lîrhai le bâwngchalhai chu a lâk a, Levi mihai a pêk a.
Tawlailîr pahni le bâwngchal pali chu Gerson naupasalhai chu an sin izir peiin a pêk a.
Tawlailîr pali le bâwngchal pa- riet chu thiempu Aron naupa Ithamar rawihai Merari naupasalhai chu an sin izir peiin a pêk a.
Kohath naupasalhai ruok chu a pêk ve nawh; hmun inthieng sin chu an chanpuol a na, a zâwna zâwn ding a ni leiin.
Thiempuhai chun hriek nâl ni chun mâichâm inhlânna dinga an thilinhlânhai chu mâichâm bula chun an inhlân a.
Chun, LALPAIN Mosie kuom- ah, “Ṭhuoitu tinin mâichâm inhlânna dinga thilinhlân chu anni chan peiah an inhlân ding a nih,” a ta.
Ni khat nia thilinhlân inhlântu chu Juda chi Amminadab naupa Nason a na;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat a rikzie chu shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga she- kel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rangkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilin- hlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga, hieng hi Amminadab naupa Nason thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni hni ni chun Issakarhai ṭhuoitu Zuar naupa Nethanel chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlâna ding chun tang- karuo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga ân hlân a. Hieng hi Zuar naupa Nethanel thilin- hlânhai chu an nih.
Ni thum ni chun Zebulun thlahai ṭhuoitu Helon naupa Eliab chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie chu shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rim- inhnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dinga kêlchal pakhat;
inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Helon naupa Eliab thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni li ni chun Reuben thlahai ṭhuoitu Sedeur naupa Elizur chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châw- tawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat; inremna inthâwi thilinhlân dingin bâwngchal pahni;
berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Sedeur naupa Elizur thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni nga ni chun Simeon thla Zurisaddai naupa Selumiel chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina ding kêlchal pakhat;
inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Zurisaddai naupa Selumiel thilin- hlânhai chu an nih.
Chun, ni ruk ni chun Gad thla- hai ṭhuoitu Deuel naupa Eliasaph chun ân hlân a,

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châw- tawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilin- hlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga an nih. Hieng hi Deuel naupa Eliasaph thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni sari ni chun Ephraim thlahai ṭhuoitu Ammihud naupa Eliasam chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châw- tawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa, beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat,
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilin- hlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Ammihud naupa Eliasam thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni riet ni chun Manasse thlahai ṭhuoitu Pedahzur naupa Gamaliel chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châw- tawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, beramtê a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol inthâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilin- hlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, be- râmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Pedahzur naupa Gamaliel thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni kuo ni chun Benjamin thla Gideoni naupa Abidan chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châw- tawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlân dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilin- hlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, be- râmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Gideoni naupa Abidan thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Chun, ni sawm ni chun Dan thlahai ṭhuoitu Ammisaddai naupa Ahiezer chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châw- tawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlâna dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat,
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilin- hlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Ammisaddai naupa Ahiezer thilinhlânhai chu a nih.
Ni sâwmpakhat ni chun, Aser thlahai ṭhuoitu Okran naupa Pagiel chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlân chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie chu shekel za le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga she- kel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châwtawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlâna dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kêlchal pakhat;
chun, inremna inthâwi thilin- hlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Okran naupa Pagiel thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Ni sâwmpahni ni chun, Naph- tali thlahai ṭhuoitu Enan naupa Ahira chun ân hlân a;

a thilinhlânhai chu tangkaruo thlêng pakhat, a rikzie shekel zâ le sâwmthum, hmun inthienga shekel sâwmsari tluka rik tangkaruo châw- tawl pakhat, fâkmi thilinhlâna dinga hriek chawkpawlsa beiphit inditaka sip ve ve;
shekel sâwm tluka rik rimin- hnika sip rângkachak haihaw pakhat;
pumrawhmang thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal tuoi pakhat, be- râmchal pakhat, berâmte a chal kum khat mi pakhat;
suol thâwina dingin kelchal pakhat;
inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal pahni, berâmchal panga, kêlchal panga, berâmte a chal kum khat mi panga a nih. Hieng hi Enan naupa Ahira thilinhlânhai chu an nih.
Chun, mâichâm hriek nâl nia Israel ṭhuoituhai thilinhlânhai chu tangkaruo thlêng sâwmpahni, tang- karuo châwtawl sâwmpahni, rângka- chak haihaw sâwmpahni;
tangkaruo thlêng chu shekel zâ le sâwmthum tluka rik seng an nih; châwtawl chu sâwmsari seng a rik a nih; tangkaruo bûrlebêlhai po po chu hmun inthienga shekel sâng hni le za li tluka rik a nih.
Riminhnika sip rângkachak haihaw sâwmpahni chu hmun in- thienga shekel sâwm tluka rik seng an nih; rângkachak haihawhai po po chu shekel za le sâwmhni tluka rik a nih;

pumrawhmang thilinhlân ding- a bâwngchal po po chu sâwmpahni an nih; berâmchal sâwmpahni, berâmte a chal kum khat mi sâwmpahni, an fâkmi thilinhlânhai leh; chun, suol thâwina dingin kêlchal sâwmpahni;

inremna inthâwi thilinhlâna dingin bâwngchal sâwmhni pali, berâmchal sâwmruk, kêlchal sâwm- ruk le berâmte a chal kum khat mi chu sâwmruk a nih. Hi hi hriek nâl hnunga mâichâm inhlânna thilin- hlânhai a nih.

Chuongchun, intuokna puon ina ama be dinga Mosie a lût chun thuthlung bâwm chunga zângaina ṭhungpha chungtienga cherub pahni- hai inkâra inthawk chun ama hung bein rawl a hriet a; rawl chun a biek tah a.
